member.name: T:Portfolio.Web.ContributorEndpoints.Create
member.remarks: Creates a new Contributor given a name.

member.name: T:Portfolio.Web.ContributorEndpoints.Delete
member.remarks: Delete a Contributor by providing a valid integer id.

member.name: T:Portfolio.Web.ContributorEndpoints.GetById
member.summary: Get a Contributor by integer ID.
member.remarks: Takes a positive integer ID and returns a matching Contributor record.

member.name: T:Portfolio.Web.ContributorEndpoints.List
member.remarks: List all contributors - returns a ContributorListResponse containing the Contributors.

member.name: T:Portfolio.Web.ContributorEndpoints.Update
member.remarks: Update an existing Contributor by providing a fully defined replacement set of values. See: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/60761955/rest-update-best-practice-put-collection-id-without-id-in-body-vs-put-collecti
